mapper.select: SELECT foster_id, foster_code, f.pet_id, f.client_id, foster_term, foster_money, foster_info, p.pet_name, p.pet_variety, p.pet_sex, p.pet_age, p.pet_status, p.pet_info, p.pet_photo, c.client_name FROM foster f, pet p, client c WHERE f.is_del = 0 AND f.pet_id = p.pet_id AND f.client_id = c.client_id AND foster_term >= now()
mapper.update: UPDATE foster SET pet_id=#{petId}, client_id=#{clientId}, foster_term=#{fosterTerm}, foster_money=#{fosterMoney}, foster_info=#{fosterInfo}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE foster_id = #{fosterId} AND is_del = 0
